title: Whoa, the MacBook Air M2 is down to $829
content:
Macworld

The M2 MacBook Air might not be the latest laptop, but it’s still one of the best Macs and laptops you can buy at its usual price of $999. But today it’s down to an insane value: The M2 MacBook Air is down to $829 at Amazon today, a superb laptop that is available for its best price ever.

While this isn’t the most recent MacBook Air model, the M2 laptop is still a powerhouse. The laptop has a strikingly thin design and weighs just 2.7 pounds, making it the perfect portable device. As mentioned, the model you can get for a mere $829 right now runs on the M2 chip with an 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, which translates into speed and efficiency no matter what task you want to complete.

You also get 256GB of storage space. As the MacBook Air features an SSD, you’ll load everything fast, even when multitasking. With some 18 hours of battery life, you won’t have to worry about remembering to take the charger with you.

The screen is a standout feature for the MacBook Air. The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display has over 500 nits of brightness, a P3 wide color, and supports 1 billion colors. Pictures and movies will look vibrant no matter what you’re looking at, and you’ll even get a decent experience when you’re using your laptop outdoors.

In our 2022 review, we gave the M2 MacBook Air 4.5 stars and praised its design and performance, calling it “wonderfully thin and light with a big beautiful display and killer battery life.” So go ahead and place your order for the MacBook Air M2 for $829 because we can’t know when the discount expires or when we’ll see such a price again.
